name: Move quickly!
description: Imediately perform one extra action.

name: Move quickly!
description: Imediately perform one extra action.

name: Move quickly!
description: Imediately perform one extra action.

name: Move quickly!
description: Imediately perform one extra action.

name: Turn back!
description: Reverse the Direction token.

name: Preparations
description: Take 2 cards if the Creature has more energy than you do.

name: Lock the door
description: Skip the activity phase this turn.

name: Night search
description: Each player chooses and discards cards from their hand until they have only 2 left.

name: Regroup
description: The Creature loses 1 card for every HANDS Character in the City dimension.

name: Throwing stuff
description: The Creature loses 1 Energy cube for every HANDS Character in the City dimension.

name: Set up a barricade
description: Each player keeps 4 Energy cubes and loses the rest.

name: Evacuation
description: Choose any neighbor of a Secured Character and remove them from the game.

name: We need to close this
description: Each player lowers their awareness by 1 if it's possible.

name: Covering your tracks
description: The Creature lowers its awareness by 1 if possible.

name: Stockroom check
description: If half of the SHOP Characters is in the City dimension - choose 1 card from the discard pile and return it in your hand.

name: Floor it!
description: Place the activity marker on any Character card.

name: Front page article
description: If the most Characters are in the Creature dimension - increase your awareness by 1.

name: On the house
description: If the Creature has more cards than you do - gain 3 Energy.

name: Risky maneuver
description: Shift the Safety marker on every Guarded Character card to Alert - and every Terrified Character card to Nervous.

name: Reroute
description: Place this card on a Character card. If the Activity marker would be placed on this Character - place it on the next Character instead and discard this card.
